item.title: JezebelのEICローラ・バセットが辞任、G/Oメディアを8ヶ月で辞める7人目のEICに、情報筋はCEOジム・スパンフェラーの下での過酷な労働条件を詳述（Lachlan Cartwright/The Daily Beast）
item.description:
Lachlan Cartwright / The Daily Beast:
Jezebel EIC Laura Bassett resigns, becoming the seventh EIC to quit G/O Media in eight months; sources detail harsh working conditions under CEO Jim Spanfeller  —  In this week's edition of Confider, we look at how G/O Media just lost its seventh EIC in eight months—a sign of absolute tumult at the private equity-owned media empire.

item.title: ジャスティン・トルドーは、カナダの山火事でニュースコンテンツをブロックし続けるメタ社を「人々の安全よりも企業の利益を優先している」と批判した（Catherine Thorbecke/CNN）
item.description:
Catherine Thorbecke / CNN:
Justin Trudeau criticizes Meta for “putting corporate profits ahead of people's safety” as the company continues blocking news content during Canadian wildfires  —  Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau blasted Facebook for “putting corporate profits ahead of people's safety” …

item.title: TrillerのS-1申請では、この短編動画アプリは5億5,000万件のサインアップを獲得したとしているが、Apptopiaの推定では、2015年のローンチ以来、ダウンロード回数はわずか7,320万回にとどまっている（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Triller's S-1 filing claims the short-form video app has had 550M signups, but Apptopia estimates it has been downloaded just 73.2M times since its 2015 launch  —  TikTok competitor Triller is preparing to go public, but estimates from Apptopia call its self-reported user numbers into question.

item.title: NPRのポッドキャストと番組制作のチーフであるアーニャ・グルンドマンは、NPRがニュースと番組を1人のチーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサーの下に統合するため、2023年末に退職する予定だ（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
NPR's podcast and programming chief, Anya Grundmann, plans to leave at the end of 2023, as NPR combines news and programming under one chief content officer  —  NPR's top programming executive, Anya Grundmann, announced today she will step down at the end of the year after nearly three decades at the network.

Maria Heeter / The Information:
Memo: Bloomberg LP names Vlad Kliatchko as CEO, JP Zammitt as President, and plans to form a new board chaired by former Bank of England governor Mark Carney  —  Bloomberg LP made a sweeping overhaul of its top ranks, putting in place a new CEO, president and chief financial officer …

item.title: YouTubeとユニバーサル・ミュージック・グループが提携、新製品開発、AIツールでの音楽利用、AI生成コンテンツに作品が使用されたアーティストへの支払いなどを検討（Miles Kruppa/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Miles Kruppa / Wall Street Journal:
YouTube and Universal Music Group partner to explore new products, using music in AI tools, and paying artists whose work is used to make AI-generated content  —  Universal Music artists and songwriters plan to explore the future of royalties and content-creation tools in the age of generative AI.

item.title: NUJが英国の地域ニュース大手がBBCから地方民主主義記者団の資金をスタッフに渡していないと非難したことを受け、ライバル出版社がニュースクエスト社を擁護（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Rival publishers defend Newsquest after the NUJ accused the UK regional news giant of not passing Local Democracy Reporters funding from the BBC to its staff  —  Reach said it has put infrastructure in place to support the LDR scheme and wants it to succeed.

Donald Trump says he plans to skip the GOP primary debates, as “the public knows who I am”; Trump has counterprogramming options like a Tucker Carlson interview  —  Trump has repeatedly criticized Fox News, the host of Wednesday's primetime event, insisting it is a “hostile network” …

item.title: サブスタックに関する記事を執筆し、ドナルド・トランプを支持するジョージア州の「代替」選挙人の2020年の会合を記録したアトランタのジャーナリスト、ジョージ・チディのプロフィール（ロバート・ドレイパー／ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Robert Draper / New York Times:
A profile of George Chidi, an Atlanta journalist who writes on Substack and who documented a 2020 meeting of “alternate” Georgia electors favoring Donald Trump  —  George Chidi's cameo appearance in the indictment of Donald J. Trump in Georgia was a plot twist, but not an accident.

item.title: コメルサントのEICへのインタビュー：ロシアの報道の自由の縮小と、物議を醸した記事の後のEU制裁の両方に直面するビジネス専門誌（Ben Aris/bne IntelliNews）
item.description:
Ben Aris / bne IntelliNews:
An interview with Kommersant's EIC as the business-focused outlet faces both Russia's shrinking press freedoms and EU sanctions after a controversial article  —  Kommersant editor: “It's not a question of pushing press freedoms outwards, but of preventing them from shrinking inwards.”

item.title: メディアの統合が進む可能性は高いが、多くのアナリストは、高金利、規制のハードル、不安定な広告市場によって、売却には最悪のタイミングになると述べている（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
More media consolidation is likely, but most analysts say high interest rates, regulatory hurdles, and a shaky ad market make for one of the worst times to sell  —  Experts agree the media business needs to consolidate.  But high interest rates, a hostile government and a shaky advertising market …

item.title: ノーベル平和賞受賞者でノバヤ・ガゼータのEICであるドミトリー・ムラトフに、彼についてのドキュメンタリー、記者への攻撃、彼の動機などについてインタビュー（Tim Adams/The Guardian）
item.description:
Tim Adams / The Guardian:
An interview with Nobel Peace Prize winner and Novaya Gazeta EIC Dmitry Muratov on the documentary about him, attacks on reporters, his motivations, and more  —  The Russian newspaper editor speaks from Moscow in an exclusive interview as a new film biography charts his defiance of the Kremlin during the war in Ukraine
